response.overview: The Suspect List is a gripping corporate thriller that explores a prominent companyâ€™s shadowy inner workings. As the story progresses, Vineeth, the CEO played by Vineeth Kumar takes the lead in attempting to solve the enigma surrounding the alleged misbehavior that has seven high executives from various departments implicated. Vineeth becomes clear as the plot deepens, a resolute force out to find the offender and figure out why they did it
response.title: Suspect list
